item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a software engineer based out of the Minneapolis/Saint Paul, Minnesota area. I’m looking for work in Elixir/Phoenix, and would love to work as part of a remote team working on a product. If you’re hiring, I’d love to chat, so please get in touch! My interests include Elixir, Ruby, GIS & geospatial data, and amateur radio.
